content.description: Start on the swirling rock feature that looks like tangled wood and move up through jugs to top out.
content.location: On the first face you come to on this wall, perpendicular to the river, path, and long wall. Just right of Halloween Americana

content.description: Start on a large left facing hold at hip height. Move directly up through small crystals until you reach a jug just below the lip. Reach up and over the lip to a fantastic series of crystal jugs to top out. Exit out right under the small overhang. You kind of have to bushwack to get back to the base, so be warned.
content.protection: 1 Pad (plus a spotter in case you slip on the lichen)
content.location: On the first face you come to on this wall, perpendicular to the river, path, and long wall.

content.description: Sit start low on the left arete. Work your way up the arete to a crystal plate, they make a big move right to the starting jug of Halloween Americana. Follow Halloween Americana to the top. Exit out right under the small overhang. You kind of have to bushwack to get back to the base, so be warned.
content.location: Left arete on the Halloween face

pathTokens: Rocky Gorge Reservoir  (T. Howard Duckett Reservoir)

content.description: A big long wall facing the river, with most of the established climbs being on the first face you come across, perpendicular to the river and rest of the wall.
